description: This file defines a toolkit class 'UserControlFlowTools' that provides methods for interacting with the user, including obtaining user input through a specified tool, and contains default instructions for user interaction.

classes.name: UserControlFlowTools
classes.description: A toolkit class that allows an agent to interrupt its run and interact with the user by requesting input through a dedicated tool.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the UserControlFlowTools with optional instructions and configuration, setting up the tool for user interaction.

methods.name: get_user_input
methods.description: Provides a mechanism to prompt the user for input based on specified fields, returning a confirmation string.
